remarks: Property of an element above a covering.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cvrletr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrletr.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cvrletr.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
cvrletr.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrletrN $p |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X C Y /\ Y .<_ Z ) -> X .< Z ) ) $.
